title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 § 2040.6 - Miscellaneous issues
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 § 2040.6 - Miscellaneous issues

State Regulations
(a) Information
requests. Requests for information made under the Freedom of

Information Law, must be submitted pursuant to HCR's website at
https://hcr.ny.gov/. (b) Changes in ownership. Any and all changes in the ownership interests or principals of any project
(prior to issuance of final credit allocation) for which an application has
been submitted to DHCR, will be subject to written confirmation by DHCR that
DHCR has no objection to the change(s) proposed. DHCR reserves the right to
disallow any application where there have been changes in the ownership
interests or principals. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9
§
2040.6

Amended

New

York State Register May 26, 2021/Volume XLIII, Issue 21, eff. 5/26/2021

Amended

New

York State Register June 11, 2025/Volume XLVII, Issue 23, eff. 6/11/2025

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. (a) Information requests. Requests for information made under the Freedom of Information

Law, must be in writing, and
may
be mailed to DHCR's

Office
of Legal Affairs, 38-40

State

Street, Albany, NY 12207, or e-mailed to FOIL@nyshcr.org
(b) Changes in ownership. Any and all changes in the ownership interests or principals of any
project
(prior to issuance of final credit allocation) for which an application has been submitted to DHCR, will be subject to written confirmation by DHCR that DHCR has no objection to the change(s) proposed. DHCR reserves the right to disallow any application where there have been changes in the ownership interests or principals. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9
§
2040.6
